author: Source: Bucksfreepress.co.uk
title: Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp set to be without Joe Gomez for rest of... - Bucksfreepress.co.uk
text:
Press Association Sport understands that 18-year-old left-back Gomez has been ruled out for the remainder of the season with a knee injury picked up while on international duty with England Under-21s. Gomez hurt his right knee in the latter stages of the Young Lions' 3-0 win against Kazakhstan in Coventry on Tuesday night.
 Bucksfreepress.co.uk.
